description:
This market refers to the Valorant match between Streamerzone INDIGO and Cristaux de Menthe in the VCT Game Changers EMEA Kickoff Playoffs, scheduled for January 16 at 1:00PM ET.

This market will resolve to "Streamerzone INDIGO" if Streamerzone INDIGO win the match against Cristaux de Menthe.

This market will resolve to "Cristaux de Menthe" if Cristaux de Menthe win the match against Streamerzone INDIGO.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to the team who wins. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50. 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/valorant/Main_Page.

markets.description:
This market refers to the Valorant match between Streamerzone INDIGO and Cristaux de Menthe in the VCT Game Changers EMEA Kickoff Playoffs, scheduled for January 16 at 1:00PM ET.

This market will resolve to "Over" if Streamerzone INDIGO and Cristaux de Menthe play 3 or more games in this series.

If fewer than 3 games are played, this market will resolve to "Under".

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.
